messages.content: How do I install the ComfyUI node for removing items with a mask using comfyui-lama-remover?

Navigate to the `/ComfyUI/custom_nodes/` folder and run `git clone https://github.com/Layer-norm/comfyui-lama-remover.git`, then restart ComfyUI. If you encounter a download error, download the `big-lama.pt` model from the provided link and place it in `/ComfyUI/custom_nodes/comfyui-lama-remover/ckpts/`.
